newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Bear Stearns starts oil companies.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Bear Stearns starts oil companies.

text.p: -- Bear Stearns started coverage of Comstock Resources Inc and Cross Timbers Oil Co as buy, a Bear Stearns source said.
-- The analyst was not available for comment.

-- The source said Bear Stearns also started coverage of the following companies with attractive ratings: Triton Energy Corp, Chesapeake Energy Corp, Louisiana Land and Exploration Co and Flores & Rucks Inc.
-- Bear Stearns also started Parker & Parsley Petroleum Co as attractive, the source said.
